subject: Business
title: The Future: What Comes After AI?
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Future: What Comes After AI?.

hook.text: Every technology wave seems like the last one. Electricity. Computers. Internet. Mobile. AI. What's next?

buildup.text: Candidates for the next wave: quantum computing, synthetic biology, brain-computer interfaces, and nuclear fusion.

discovery.text: Quantum computers could solve problems that would take classical computers billions of years.

twist.text: The next disruption might not be a technology. It could be a business model, a social shift, or a regulatory change.

climax.text: The most transformative innovations are always obvious in hindsight and invisible in foresight.

punchline.text: The future is already here. It's just unevenly distributed.
